Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, the wounded and priority evacuees have finished boarding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Should we get them going immediately?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Give me a minute. I'll go take a look.", 3: '7'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory737.jpg'}
{3: "The transport craft that Vera's team brought is now filled with people. The majority are elders and children, with only a few individuals being carried on stretchers."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Salans', 3: 'That thing stopped.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Salans points at the globular forest that almost extended to your vicinity.'}
{2: 'Is everyone alright?', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: "Only a few are slightly scratched. They'll be fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: "Still, we've seen much worse when the tower in the Clean Zone appeared. Having scratches was like winning the lottery at that time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: 'But the waves of tremors are really unsettling.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You wonder if it looks akin to a tumor abruptly sprouting from the surface, as seen from Babylonia's point of view."}
{3: 'But the true horror that it resembles can only be fully experienced when one sets foot upon this land.'}
{3: 'In contrast to the Inver-Hetero Tower, seemingly an intricate craft of another realm, the globular forest strands as a manifestation of betrayal originating from the soil.'}

{3: 'Not a majestic staircase crafted by divine hands but a menace standing right before your eyes, whose roots have quietly torn the land apart in fleeting moments. Even the once tranquil woods surrounding it now exude an ominous aura.'}
{3: 'Fortunately, its rapid growth has been slowing down after it first materialized.'}
{3: "With its initial expanding speed, everything in your view would've been devoured already by now."}
{3: 'However, that uncanny vitality persists, which everyone can feel through the occasional vibrations beneath their feet.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Give us a break already.', 3: '31'}
{2: 'How many trips will it take to evacuate everyone in the conservation area?', 3: '32'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Salans', 3: 'All the wounded are aboard, and those stretchers are taking up quite some space. I think three trips would suffice... No, actually, we might just pull it off in two trips.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'On which trip are you leaving?', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: "I'll stick around until the very last person leaves. Don't worry, there are trustworthy people within that group. I'm honestly not so important as you might think.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, the Constructs leaving with them will help them settle down as well.', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Salans', 3: "Okay, then I'll leave that to you guys.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having said that, Salans firmly strides toward a group of men who appear to be preoccupied with their tasks.'}
{3: 'They are trying to push down the empty houses that teeter on the brink of collapse to avoid any potential danger if another wave of tremors hits.'}
{3: 'Observing Salans as he rolls up his sleeves and joins the group, you feel a newfound respect for him as a leader growing within you, even though he claims himself to be "not so important."'}
{3: 'In the corner of your eye, you catch a glimpse of Lee lifting the tent curtain and waving at you. After one last gaze at the transport craft that is taking off, you hastily make your way back.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory732.jpg'}
{3: 'The thing placed on the table is an assistance device for remote connections, an exclusive piece of equipment that belongs to Cerberus.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'I knew there should be something that could come in handy!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "This channel for remote connection with Constructs is exclusive to Cerberus, and its specs are more advanced compared to the standard ones. It's worth a shot!", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Construct', 3: "But I heard that their commandant is pretty much the only one who can establish a remote connection with Cerberus members. Even if we manage to make it work, there's no guarantee that...", 4: '2'}

{3: 'The Construct mumbles something like "The Gray Raven Commandant is surely a legend." His face contorts with frustration as if he is depicting the pain of building a M.I.N.D. connection with some crazy Constructs, all based on the groundless rumors he has heard.'}
{3: 'But the imaginary pain apparently has little effect on his work efficiencyâ€”he quickly finishes setting up the device.'}
{3: 'Lee lets out a quiet sigh.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll call Liv over to get you some emergency medical supplies, just in case.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'As far as I know, no one has ever built a remote connection with that new frame... You sure about this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'There will soon be one.', 3: '60'}

{2: 'Construct', 3: "What I mean is, that the new frame has not been fully calibrated for remote connections. It might take you a few attempts before you reach her, and trust me, the process won't be a walk in the park. You gotta be prepared.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'From moments of strangeness to sudden startles, and even times when she is seemingly lost in her own thoughts, you have experienced the full spectrum of her emotions.'}
{3: "It's just a change of her frame, but No. 21 is still No. 21."}
{3: 'The most pressing matter at hand is to help them overcome the current adversity.'}
{3: 'You close your eyes.'}
